subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: The sixth-seeded Petra Kvitova, the 2011 Wimbledon champion, beat No. 23 Lucie Safarova, and the 13th-seeded Eugenie Bouchard beat No. 3 Simona Halep to advance to Saturday’s final.
snippet: The sixth-seeded Petra Kvitova, the 2011 Wimbledon champion, beat No. 23 Lucie Safarova, and the 13th-seeded Eugenie Bouchard beat No. 3 Simona Halep to advance to Saturday’s final.
